dmypolyId.Wiki: Damipoly ID of decal generation standard. If specified by TAE, it will be the value of TAE.

maskSpeffectId.Wiki: Monitoring special effect ID. If you enter an arbitrary special effect ID, decals will not be generated unless the special effect is applied.

replaceTextureId_byMaterial.Wiki: When it is generated by an attack hit, 1 changes the texture depending on the defense material. New Texture ID = Blood Material ID * 10000000 + Original Texture ID

dmypolyCategory.Wiki: Damipoli Search Location 0 Body 1 Left Hand Weapon 2 Right Hand Weapon

useDeferredDecal.Wiki: Acts as a deferred decal at 1

usePaintDecal.Wiki: Acts as a paint decal at 1

bloodTypeEnable.Wiki: Affected by optional bloody expression, ID is +1000 in mild, do not paste if hidden

bUseNormal.Wiki: 1 if normal component is used (compatible with normal and shinyness texture integration)

usePom.Wiki: Whether to enable Parallax occlusion mapping

appearDirType.Wiki: Reference coordinates that determine the direction in which the decal is flown

emissiveTime.Wiki: Interpolation time from start value to end value

bIntpEnable.Wiki: Do you generate the time when the bar is extended due to the decal generation of TAE?

intpIntervalDist.Wiki: Distance to interpolate decals generated between TAE bars when interpolation is enabled

beginIntpTextureId.Wiki: Texture ID at the start of interpolation (-1 uses the same value as the texture ID)

endIntpTextureId.Wiki: Texture at the end of interpolation Texture ID (-1 uses the same value as the texture ID)

appearSfxId.Wiki: SFXID issued when the decal is affixed (Nothing is issued with -1)

appearSfxOffsetPos.Wiki: Offset distance of SFX generation position

maskTextureId.Wiki: Mask texture ID (see texture ID with -1)

diffuseTextureId.Wiki: Albedo Texture ID (See Texture ID with -1)

reflecTextureId.Wiki: Reflectance texture ID (see texture ID with -1)

maskScale.Wiki: Mask strength (currently valid only with deferred decals)

normalTextureId.Wiki: Normal texture ID (see texture ID with -1)

heightTextureId.Wiki: Height texture ID (see texture ID with -1)

emissiveTextureId.Wiki: Emissive Texture ID (See Texture ID with -1)

lifeTimeSec.Wiki: Lifespan [seconds] (Time after decal is applied, fade-in time does not matter)

priority.Wiki: The larger this value, the easier it is to remain (-1 does not disappear)

bDistThinOutEnable.Wiki: Whether to thin out if there is a decal nearby

bAlignedTexRandomVariationEnable.Wiki: If you select Yes, one variation number randomly determined for each texture other than 0 will be applied. The number of non-zero variations must be the same.

distThinOutCheckDist.Wiki: Candidates for thinning if there is a decal within this distance

distThinOutCheckAngleDeg.Wiki: Candidates for thinning if the difference in decal direction is within this angle

distThinOutMaxNum.Wiki: If the distance and angle are more than this number, thin out

distThinOutCheckNum.Wiki: How many recent thinning candidates to check

delayAppearFrame.Wiki: After trying to paste the decal, it will actually be pasted after this frame

randVaria_Diffuse.Wiki: Number of random variations of albedo texture (including 0th, 2 for 2 textures)

randVaria_Mask.Wiki: Number of random variations of mask texture (including 0th, 2 for 2 textures)

randVaria_Reflec.Wiki: Number of random variations of reflex textures (including 0th, 2 for 2 textures)

randVaria_Normal.Wiki: Number of random variations of normal texture (including 0th, 2 for 2 textures)

randVaria_Height.Wiki: Number of random variations of height texture (including 0th, 2 for 2 textures)

randVaria_Emissive.Wiki: Number of random variations of emissive textures (including 0th, 2 for 2 textures)

Self.Wiki: Decal data - Used for blood splatter, arrow holes, etc
